CustomField.description: "Territory" is the dependent picklist for "Division". Based on the Territory values, sharing rules are set up to let the Sales Reps for a specific Territory (defined by their Role) have access to the (Contractor) Accounts for that territory.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose IKO Sales Rep Division CACS: Canada Commercial Sales CARS: Canada Residential Sales USRS: US Residential Sales
CustomField.label: Division
